section.p: 'List of preferred pharmaceutical products to be used by a managed care plan's network physicians. Formularies are based on evaluations of the efficacy, safety, and cost-effectiveness of drugs.' -eHealthInsurance.org

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] contractId with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] healthPlan, where its type is Health Plan
Contains exactly one [1..1] billableAct, where its type is Billable Service
